name: SendMessage
friendlyName: Send message on a remote server
description: Send a message using msg command on a remote server
author: Comerco

inputs.name: AdminUserName
inputs.label: Login
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Administrator login for the target machine.
Eg: domain\username

inputs.name: AdminPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Password for administrator login for the target machine.
It can accept variable defined in Build/Release definitions as '$(passwordVariable)'.
You may mark variable type as 'secret' to secure it.

inputs.name: MachineName
inputs.label: Machine name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the machine where to send the message.
